name: King Taksin the Great
what_did:
After Ayutthaya was destroyed, Taksin rebuilt the Thai kingdom from ruins.
He gathered people, fought back invaders, and made Thonburi the new capital.
He helped keep the Thai nation alive.
why_matters:
Taksin is honored for saving and uniting Thailand after a time of chaos.
His actions helped the country rise again and stay strong.

questions.q: What city did King Taksin make the capital?
What did King Taksin do after Ayutthaya fell?
What is King Taksin remembered for?

fun_fact: His statue in Thonburi shows him riding a horse, ready to lead his people!
